p: Despite the implementation of measles universal immunization programmes, several industrialized countries achieved suboptimal MMR/MMRV vaccination coverages, as consequence of antivaccination movements arising from a now completely discredited claim of a link between MMR/MMRV vaccine and autism [ 33], and that have represented a major reason for the Italian government to recently introduce mandatory vaccination against some common disease, among which measles, for all children aged under 16 [ 34].
